name: Osmind
headline: Platform for breakthrough mental health research and treatment
description:
Osmind is the premier platform for clinicians and researchers advancing new life-saving mental health treatments. Today, mental health disorders are one of the leading causes of death worldwide, especially among young adults, and are tied to shortening lifespans. While there have been developments in new psychiatric medications since the first FDA approval in 1954, today there is a growing movement among clinicians, patients, and researchers who are recognizing the need to accelerate new science.

The Osmind treatment platform is the first and only solution that solves specific challenges faced by neuropsychiatric clinics, spanning general psychiatry and interventional psychiatry (transcranial magnetic stimulation, ketamine, SPRAVATO®, psychedelic medicine, electroconvulsive therapy). The core electronic health record (EHR) technology is precisely developed for interventional treatment workflows and designed to support a strong therapeutic alliance, including journaling tools and assistance with health plan reimbursement, which is a significant access hurdle for millions of patients.

Research from our platform is already helping to set new standards for mental health interventions. For example, in the largest published real-world analysis of ketamine infusion therapy for depression, we teamed up with Stanford University School of Medicine to share findings in the Journal of Affective Disorders (March 2022). We have multiple ongoing research studies leveraging our proprietary real-world data, including an even larger ketamine analysis leveraging machine learning to predict treatment outcomes.

Osmind is a San Francisco–based public benefit corporation led by scientists, technologists, and psychiatrists. We are backed by top investors including DFJ Growth, General Catalyst, Future Ventures, Tiger Global, and Y Combinator.

founders.name: Lucia Huang, Founder
founders.description: Lucia Huang is co-founder and CEO of Osmind, which provides software and data for precision mental health. Previously, she ran business and operations at Verge Genomics (S15) and helped scale the company from seed to A. She started her career in healthcare investment banking and investing. Lucia graduated with an MBA from Stanford and a B.S. Chemistry degree from Yale, where she first began to explore her passion for healthcare. She is a proud Californian and loves surfing, cycling, and hiking.

# Join the networkTreat your patientsTransform mental health
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a702_ssssad.webp)
The nationwide network of 800+ independent psychiatry practices advancing mental health treatment and research
## The premier EHR and network for innovative psychiatry
Join thousands of clinicians who trust Osmind’s EHR software and services to run their psychiatry practices and stay ahead of the curve, and leading life sciences companies working with Osmind to drive evidence generation, accelerate trials, and enhance engagement with new treatments. Let’s close the gap between scientific innovation and real-world care.
[Schedule an EHR demo](https://osmind.org/</demo>)
![Man looking at graphics on a desktop computer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/673fee946df2bce8d8218f53_Homepage%20Community.avif)
![Man looking at graphics on a desktop computer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a876_62a8673bd88f2c9b28dcf402_1-p-800%201.webp)
## Modern psychiatry EHR with robust outcomes tracking
Streamline your workflow, prescribe medications, stay compliant, and analyze patient-reported outcomes. Use charting templates made for clinicians managing psychiatric medications and administering interventions like TMS, ketamine, and SPRAVATO®.
[Learn more](https://osmind.org/</psychiatry-ehr>)
## Connect with 1000+ forward-thinking psychiatric clinicians
Stay up-to-date on the latest treatments, evidence-based best practices, secrets to independent practice success, and more while building meaningful connections with your peers. Join 1,000+ forward-thinking mental health clinicians staying ahead of the curve and transforming mental healthcare.
[Join today](https://osmind.org/</join-community>)
![Patient and doctor talking during infusion therapy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/673ff08c3ecde395a3a89568_Homepage%20Join%20Community.avif)
![Patient standing at the door of the doctor's office](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a877_62a8672aceb3ba27bc8a5c95_2-p-800%201.webp)
## It's time for a quantum shift in mental health interventions
Join clinicians and researchers on the premier platform for evidence-generating medicine, advancing life-saving breakthroughs and better treatments. Research from the Osmind platform is already helping to set new standards for mental health interventions.
[Explore life sciences solutions](https://osmind.org/</life-sciences>)
![Colorful pathway of Osmind's branding](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a848_home-page-path-extrawide-3840x1080-10.webp)
## Forward-thinking clinicians choose Osmind
[Get started today](https://osmind.org/</demo>)
![Green checkmark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a874_62a84989b2c5fb26972c1e2c_green-check%201.webp)
All-in-one psychiatry EHR and services
![Green checkmark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a874_62a84989b2c5fb26972c1e2c_green-check%201.webp)
Engaged psychiatry community
![Green checkmark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a874_62a84989b2c5fb26972c1e2c_green-check%201.webp)
Improved patient outcomes
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a87a_62a84d075e1a2dc8fc40cc5b_Seth%20Mehr%201.webp)
"I feel like they're forward thinking and interested in evolving and growing as is my practice. They have a comprehensive, user-friendly ketamine specific health record and patient portal. "
Seth Mehr
MD
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a87e_62a84d15c91c4576b46610eb_Pamela%20Ruppel%201.webp)
“I am happy to be using Osmind. I feel like your vision and mine are aligned. I appreciate your willingness to ask me what I need for my practice. Your success is my success!"
Pamela Ruppel
PMHNP
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a6be_Erin%20H.webp)
"Format and note writing in Osmind is what personally sold me - it’s pre-formatted and simple. That was the selling point for me. Simplicity of scheduling clients, simplicity of overall layout and look - very clean and basic compared to some things that are complex to learn. "
Erin Holleman
Psychiatric Nurse Practitioner, APRN, PMHNP, FNP
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a6bd_Chelsie%20Monroe.webp)
"I know I can call someone over there and get someone I know, and you respond back."
Chelsie Monroe
PMHNP
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1358b4dec382d8356a688/65c1358b4dec382d8356a6d5_Ron.webp)
"I have been using Osmind for about a year now and have been impressed. I do quite a bit of teaching to other NPs about Spravato and using Osmind. You guys have made my job much easier by streamlining the process. We get to spend more time with the patients and less time documenting"
Ron Tyree
PMHNP-BC

generated_description:
**Osmind: Pioneering Mental Health Solutions**

Founded in 2020 and based in San Francisco, Osmind is a public benefit corporation dedicated to transforming mental health care through cutting-edge research and digital solutions. With a team of 55 employees and backed by top-tier investors like Y Combinator, General Catalyst, and Tiger Global, Osmind is at the forefront of addressing one of the most pressing health crises of our time—mental health disorders.

### Mission

Osmind's mission is simple yet profound: create a platform that accelerates breakthrough research and treatment options for mental health issues, which are now leading causes of death globally, particularly among young adults. While new psychiatric medications have emerged since the mid-20th century, Osmind recognizes the urgent need to hasten scientific advances in this field.

### Unique Offerings

What sets Osmind apart is its tailored treatment platform designed specifically for neuropsychiatric clinics. It caters to various treatment modalities, including:

- **Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (TMS)**
- **Ketamine Therapy**
- **SPRAVATO®**
- **Psychedelic Medicine**
- **Electroconvulsive Therapy (ECT)**

The platform incorporates a specialized electronic health record (EHR) system, optimized for interventional psychiatry workflows. This technology is not just about data; it’s about enhancing the therapeutic relationship through features like journaling tools and support for health plan reimbursements—a critical barrier for many seeking care.

### Research Collaborations

Osmind is actively engaged in transformative research, including groundbreaking studies in collaboration with Stanford University. One of their significant contributions is the largest real-world analysis of ketamine infusion therapy for depression, which was published in the *Journal of Affective Disorders*. Ongoing research efforts leverage machine learning to analyze real-world data, helping predict treatment outcomes and set new standards in mental health interventions.

### Community and Growth

Osmind is more than just a tech company; it's a network of over 800 independent psychiatry practices committed to advancing mental health treatment and research. This community collaborates to stay ahead of the curve in evidence-based practices, enhancing both clinician success and patient outcomes.

### Vision and Values

At its core, Osmind is driven by the belief that mental health care needs a quantum shift. Their user-friendly EHR system and robust support network aim to close the gap between scientific innovation and everyday care. For those looking to understand what’s next in mental health, Osmind is a beacon of insight and change.

### Conclusion

In a world where mental health challenges are increasingly recognized, Osmind stands out as a forward-thinking leader dedicated to advancing the field. If you’re a clinician looking to enhance your practice or a researcher eager to participate in groundbreaking studies, Osmind provides both the technology and community support to help you succeed.

**Check them out at [Osmind.org](https://osmind.org).**
